content.rendered: BridgeBio is a team of experienced drug discoverers, developers and innovators working to create life-altering medicines that target well-characterized genetic diseases at their source. We have over 20 development programs in our pipeline including potential therapies ranging from early discovery to late-stage development.

excerpt.rendered: BridgeBio is a team of experienced drug discoverers, developers and innovators working to create life-altering medicines that target well-characterized genetic diseases at their source. We have over 20 development programs in our pipeline including potential therapies ranging from early discovery to late-stage development.

acf.meta_description: Targeting Genetic Diseases at Their Source
acf.page_content_primary:
our product platform

Our drug engineering platform leverages and efficiently translates innovation into therapies that matter.
acf.page_content_secondary:
our commitment to patients

BridgeBio ultimately exists to help patients. We are committed to discover, create, test, and deliver breakthrough medicines for genetic diseases to patients as quickly and safely as possible.
acf.statistics_title: We are poised to potentially help 4.5m+ patients across our pipeline
